Title: The Star Performer Takes the Stage?! Captain Ginyu vs Son Goku
Writer: Aya Matsui, Keiji Terui, Akira Toriyama
Actors: Masako Nozawa, Mayumi Tanaka, Hiromi Tsuru
Plot: As Frieza prepares for his ruthless interrogation of the Eldest Namekian, Goku shows off the benefits of training in gravity one hundred times that of Earth. Will it be enough to help him defeat Captain Ginyu?
